words.source: H834 waw + rel. pron. ʾasher 'who, which'; KJV 'and he that', ESV 'but whoever', NASB 'but he who'

H3820 n.ms constr. lev 'heart' + 3ms suff.; KJV 'his heart', ESV 'his heart', NASB 'his heart'
H413 prep. 'to, toward'; KJV 'unto', ESV 'to', NASB 'to'
H1697 n.ms constr. davar 'word'; KJV 'the word of', ESV 'the word of', NASB 'the word of'
H3068 divine name, Tetragrammaton; KJV 'the LORD', ESV 'the LORD', NASB 'the LORD'
H5800 wayyiqtol 3ms Qal of עָזַב 'to leave, forsake'; KJV 'left', ESV 'left', NASB 'left'
H853 direct object marker; untranslated in English
H5650 n.mp constr. ʿeved 'servant' + 3ms suff.; KJV 'his servants', ESV 'his slaves', NASB 'his servants'
